channel.title: CVE Feed for LJ Apps -- WP Review Slider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LJ Apps -- WP Review Slider

item.title: CVE-2023-51685|2024-02-01T10:37:07.931Z -- lj%20apps -- wp%20review%20slider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in LJ Apps WP Review Slider allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Review Slider: from n/a through 12.7.
